Class JkUtilsIO

public final class JkUtilsIO
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class for dealing with Inputs/Outputs.

addZipEntry

public static void addZipEntry(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zos,
                               java.io.File fileToZip,
                               java.io.File baseFolder)
Add a zip entry into the provided ZipOutputStream. The zip entry is the part of filePathToZip truncated with the baseFolderPath.

So a file or folder c:\my\base\folder\my\file\to\zip.txt will be added in archive using my/file/to/zip.txt entry.

addZipEntry

public static void addZipEntry(java.util.zip.ZipOutputStream zos,
                               java.io.File fileToZip,
                               java.lang.String enrtyName)

copyUrlContentToCacheFile

public static java.io.File copyUrlContentToCacheFile(java.net.URL url,
                                                     java.io.PrintStream report,
                                                     java.io.File cacheDir)
Copies the content of an url in a cache file. The cached file path will be [jerkar user dir]/cache/url-contents/[last segment of the url (after last '/')]. If the file already exist than the content of the url is not copied and the file is directly returned.

Copies the content of the given url to the specified file.
